line.text: Poor soul the centre of my sinful earth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My sinful earth these rebel powers array
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Why dost thou pine within and suffer dearth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Painting thy outward walls so costly gay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Why so large cost having so short a lease
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Dost thou upon thy fading mansion spend
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Shall worms inheritors of this excess
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Eat up thy charge is this thy body end
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then soul live thou upon thy servant loss
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And let that pine to aggravate thy store
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Buy terms divine in selling hours of dross
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Within be fed without be rich no more
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: So shall thou feed on death that feeds on men
